casebody.data:
SCHEFFER
v.
DALTON. No. 386P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Michael J. Levine, Mooresville, for Scheffer, John James, et al. William F. Lipscomb, Wilkesboro, for Dalton, Nathaniel Eugene. Michael J. Greer, Mooresville, for Scheffer, John James. Ann C. Rowe, Winston-Salem, for NC Association of Defense Attorneys.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of March 2016 by NC Association of Defense Attorneys for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
